Shumar crushers

We work with the leading coal-crushing equipment manufacturer, Shumar.

Our partnership is built on continuous improvement and delivering the latest design software and manufacturing processes available. This means more efficiencies and profitability for our clients.

Benefits

Sustainable

Reduced fines

Power-saving

Long-lasting

Double-Roll

Our unique Double Roll crushing principle and segment design has resulted in improved plant efficiencies as well as increased profitability for our clients by reducing the amount of fines generated through the crushing process.
